modName: Main Theme Replacer Game Of Thrones When the Wolves cry out
summary: Mod to replace Skyrim's Main Theme by the Song "When the Wolves cry out" by Miracle Of Sound
descriptionHtml:
This is Mod to replace Skyrim's Main Theme by the Song "When the Wolves cry out" by Miracle Of Sound
The song his about Game of Thrones Character: Jon Snow

The Song belongs to Miracle Of Sound and this mod was created with his permission.

Here the Links to the Music:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mmNjkflVijU

Thank you for downloading, and sorry if I made Mistakes on the Language, it isn't my native Language :)
author: AragornGhost15
